text: Anne Klein Women's Prize is an award in order to celebrate the memory of Anne Klein. The Heinrich Böll Foundation started the award in 2012, and gives annual prize to women committed to gender democracy. == Winners == Year Winner Video 2012 Nivedita Prasad 2013 Lepa Mlađenović https://www.boell.de/en/democracy/awards-16817.html 2014 Imelda Marrufo Nava 2015 Nebahat Akkoç, 2016 Gisela Burckhardt 2017 Nomarussia Bonase https://www.boell.de/en/2017/02/09/anne-klein-womens-award-2017-explanatory- statement-jury 2018 Jineth Bedoya Lima Mayerlis Angarita Robles https://www.boell.de/en/2018/02/06/anne-klein-womens- award-2018-jineth-bedoya-lima-and-mayerlis-angarita-robles 2019 Kristina Hänel https://www.boell.de/de/2018/11/26/anne-klein-frauenpreis-2019-kristina- haenel-natascha-nicklaus-und-nora-szasz-aerztinnen?dimension1=ds_akp_2019 2020 Prasanna Gettu https://www.boell.de/en/anne-klein-womens-award-2020 == References == Category:Awards Category:2012 establishments Category:German culture
title: Anne Klein Women's Prize
